name: Race against ferrum gigantes
description:
Our participation for Ludum-dare 38 is live!
2 ambitious graduate students from Mediacollege Amsterdam first entry!

We hope you'll enjoy!

Controlls:
ASWD/ARROWS - Controlling car.
Mouse drag - Camera movement.
ESCAPE - Pause.
1-2-3 KEYS - Switching radio chanel.
SPACE - Next radio song.

Credits:
Code: Justin Scott Bieshaar
Art: Bram Nijland

Just in case the download did not work:
Download.zip
